releaseNotes: Critical production fixes and security enhancements: (1) Resolved PostgreSQL enum migration failures with native_enum=False compatibility fixes; (2) Fixed Alembic multiple head revisions error by creating linear migration chain; (3) Completed comprehensive security cleanup - removed sensitive credentials from entire git history using BFG Repo Cleaner; (4) Upgraded deprecated GitHub Actions (v3â†’v4) to restore CI/CD pipeline functionality; (5) Enhanced subscription plan management with upgrade/downgrade capabilities; (6) Added emergency production scripts for database maintenance and diagnostics; (7) Implemented idempotent migrations safe for production reruns; (8) Cleaned up 4 outdated remote feature branches containing security commits; (9) Fixed enum validation errors preventing production deployments; (10) Added production-grade error handling and recovery mechanisms. Security: Completely removed .claude/settings.local.json and other sensitive files from 596 git objects across all branches and history. All exposed credentials should be rotated immediately.
author: Coachly Team
